page.title: 19TRANSPORT
page.content:
We are surrounded by a complex structure of Motorways. There is the M40,M4 and the new M25.The convenience of these Motorways also has disadvantages.The A355 is a link from the M40 to the M4. It bisects the village of Farnham Common and is extremely busy. Between 8.40 to 8.50am we counted 320 travelling towards the M4. This dropped to 80 in ten minutes during the day. Heathrow airport is also close by.
Pollution of the air from fumes is already causing concern. We did a simple test of wiping grass at the roadside. It was very black. We did the same thing 3mback from the road and our sample was grey.
